## Tasks

### <a name="init"></a>`init`

Inspect the value of resources

**Supports noop?** false

#### Parameters

##### `type`

Data type: `String`

The type of the resource to retrieve

##### `name`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

The name of the resource instance to retrieve
